För Startups

Fokusera på din verksamhet och låt oss leta kapital

Ansök med ditt startup

1. Granskning & förberedelse

När ni skickat in alla nödvändig information så kommer Angelr att granska och bedöma bolaget. Vi kan sedan hjälpa till att sätta en rimlig värdering och bistå vid framtagande av IM samt budget.

2. Investerarträffar

Bolaget ger oss sedan sina preferenser kring vilken typ av investerare som söks och vi bestämmer datum för potentiella investerarträffar. Angelr scannar sedan nätverket och kontaktar de investerare som har en passande profil. Möten bokas med de investerare som är intresserade av att höra mer.​​​​​​​

3. Legal assistans & stängning

Angelr följer upp med investerare och skickar ut en teckningslista till dem som är intresserade. Angelr kan via våra partners också hjälpa till med all legala delar, som t.ex. avtal och nyemission.

Fallstudier

Angelr har hjälpt 10 bolag med kapitalanskaffning under 2017. Nedan kan du läsa vad entreprenörerna vi har hjälpt säger.

DEVV

"Angelr has helped Devv with fundraising. We have through Angelr come in contact with many relevant contacts, from one of which we’ve received an investment. We are very pleased with the work that Angelr has done and will hire them for our next round of funding. We can without a doubt recommend Angelr to other startups that are seeking capital."

Kris Ledel Grundare DEVV
Kapitalbelopp Ej Offentligt
Typ Nyemission
Antal Investerare Undisclosed
BOFINK

"Bofink used Angelr’s services for our financing round and can gladly recommend them to other startups. First and foremost, we are very satisfied with the quality of the investors Angelr connected us with Secondly, Angelr connected us with a large number of investors which essentially lead us to picking and choosing which ones we wanted for the round."

Joachim Ronneback Thomson Grundare BOFINK
Kapitalbelopp SEK 5 000 000
Typ Nyemission
Antal Investerare 5
Aéryne

"Angelr set up meetings with several competent investors that matched our preferences! Because of the time and dedication they put in, we didn’t have to allocate as much time to fundraising and the process as a whole was very quick. I can sincerely recommend other startups to use Angelr’s services when fundraising."

Siri Vikman Grundare Aéryne
Kapitalbelopp SEK 9 000 000
Typ Nyemission

Angelr is a funding portal owned and operated by Angelr AB. Angelr is not a broker dealer or an investment adviser. Nothing on this site constitutes advice to buy or sell securities. All activities on this site are governed by our Terms of Service. Arbitration is the sole dispute resolution method for any legal matter involving Angelr or its users.

Every investor should be aware that investments in private companies are particularly risky and may result in total loss of invested capital. Past performance of a security or a company does not guarantee future results or returns. Only investors who understand the risks of early stage investment and who meet Angelr’s investment criteria may invest.

Angelr do not recommend any companies for investment, endorse their fitness for investment or verify or claim the accuracy of information provided by such companies. No part of the work carried out by Angelr is intended to constitute financial advice.
